Overview

This is a demo screen component that provides a user interface for switching between different demo examples. It features a responsive layout with a theme toggle (light/dark mode), navigation buttons for desktop view, and a dropdown menu for mobile devices. The component displays different demo content based on user selection, making it easy to showcase multiple examples in a clean, organized manner.

This simple description captures the main functionality without diving into technical implementation details.
